About

Hey there! This is Rohit Varkey Thankachan’s blog, a Computer Science Masters student at Georgia Tech. I am passionate about the open source and am a Pythonista. I’ve contributed to several packages in the Julia community. My resume can be found here.

I completed my undergrad at National Institute of Technology Karnataka, Surathkal in May 2016.

I enjoy soccer and am also a Kerala Blasters and Manchester United fan!

You can find my projects on my Github repository.

You can also find me on :

  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • LinkedIn

This blog is built using Jekyll using the brilliant Hyde theme and hosted on Github Pages!
